ScriptAction.Script:
SetInventoryEnabled(true)

-- Saving tip when halfway through MQ01
if not Storage.GetFlag("TIP_SAVE_AT_INN") and Player:HasItem("I_MQ01_InnPass") then
    Storage.SetFlag("TIP_SAVE_AT_INN", true)
    Log("TIP_SAVE_AT_INN", Color.Highlight)
end

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Bail!

Children.Title: Talk
Children.Tooltip: Exchange words with other living things.

Children.Title: < Back
Children.Tooltip: Never mind... words are hard.

Children.Title: Barkeep
Children.Tooltip: Talk to the fellow behind the bar.

ScriptAction.Script:
-- Reset the bartender context for all following interactions in case it was removed
Text.SetContext("bartender", barkeep)

-- Greeting text
local key = Storage.GetFlag("town_inn_barkeep_first")
    and "TOWN_INN_BARKEEP_BEGIN"
    or "TOWN_INN_BARKEEP_BEGIN_FIRST"
Storage.SetFlag("town_inn_barkeep_first", true)
Log(key)

Children.Title: Drink
Children.Tooltip: Buy a drink and spend some time at the bar.

Children.Title: Inn
Children.Tooltip: Ask about how this inn came to be.

Children.Title: Work
Children.Tooltip: Ask the barkeep if he knows any leads for work.

Children.Title: Bridge
Children.Tooltip: Ask how a trade route could just collapse like that.

Children.Title: Acting Mayor
Children.Tooltip: Ask what he meant by 'acting' mayor.

Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: Thank him for the information.

Children.Title: Show Pass
Children.Tooltip: Show the pass from the mayor.

Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: Thank him and take your leave.

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("MQ01_BARKEEP4")

-- Exchange pass for free room
Player:TakeItem("I_MQ01_InnPass")
Storage.SetFlag("town_inn_rented_room", true)

-- Complete MQ01
Storage.SetFlag("mq01_done", true)
Player:AwardXP(RewardXP.MQ01_Complete)
Journal.Close("MQ01")
Journal.Update("MQ02", 10)

Children.Title: Bridge Supplies
Children.Tooltip: Say you've got news.

Children.Title: Finish
Children.Tooltip: That's all you know right now.

ScriptAppear.Script:
return
    Storage.GetFlag("mq02f_discuss_supplies") and
    Storage.GetFlag("mq02f_discuss_tiger") and
    Storage.GetFlag("mq02f_discuss_oliver") and
    Storage.GetFlag("mq02f_discuss_randall")

ScriptAction.Script:
Storage.SetFlag("MQ02_DONE", true)
Log("MQ02_BARKEEP_END2")
Player:AwardXP(RewardXP.MQ02_Complete)
Journal.Close("MQ02")
Journal.Update("MQ03", 20)

Children.Title: Supplies
Children.Tooltip: Say where the supplies are.

Children.Title: Messenger
Children.Tooltip: Explain what happened to the first messenger.

Children.Title: Forester
Children.Tooltip: Explain what happened to Oliver.

ScriptAction.Script:
Storage.SetFlag("mq02f_discuss_oliver", true)

-- alternate keys for outcome of Oliver scene
local key = "MQ02_BARKEEP_OLIVER"
if Storage.GetFlag("oliver_eaten") then
    key = "MQ02_BARKEEP_OLIVER_EATEN"
elseif Storage.GetFlag("oliver_dead") then
    key = "MQ02_BARKEEP_OLIVER_DEAD"
end
Log(key)

Children.Title: Randall
Children.Tooltip: Talk about the cocky wolf you met.

Children.Title: Rent a Room
Children.Tooltip: Ask about a bed for the night.

Children.Title: Never mind
Children.Tooltip: Oh well...

Children.Title: Taur
Children.Tooltip: Talk to the big fuzzy-looking taur in the corner.

Children.Title: Introduce
Children.Tooltip: Get their attention.

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("INN_FOXTAUR_JOIN1")

if temp_getdrink == true then
    -- picked the 'drink' option earlier
    Log("INN_FOXTAUR_JOIN_DRINK")
end

Log("INN_FOXTAUR_JOIN2")

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Walk away.

Children.Title: Chameleon
Children.Tooltip: Talk to the hooded fellow by the bar.

ScriptAppear.Script: return not Storage.GetFlag("MQ03_STARTED") and not Storage.GetFlag("TOWN_INN_ZOSK_MET")

Children.Title: Zosk
Children.Tooltip: Talk to the friendly merchant again.

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Bid farewell.

Children.Title: Job
Children.Tooltip: Ask Zosk about his work.

Children.Title: Bridge
Children.Tooltip: Ask about what the work stoppage means for him.

Children.Title: Repairs!
Children.Tooltip: Tell Zosk that repairs are finally about to start properly!

Children.Title: Go Upstairs
Children.Tooltip: Head up to your room.

ScriptAction.Script:
if Storage.GetFlag("TOWN_INN_ROOM_VISITED") then
    Log("TOWN_INN_ROOM_ENTER")
else
    Storage.SetFlag("TOWN_INN_ROOM_VISITED", true)
    Log("TOWN_INN_ROOM_ENTER_FIRST")
    Log("TOWN_INN_ROOM_ENTER_SAVE", Color.Highlight)
end

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Go back to the common room.

Children.Title: Save
Children.Tooltip: Record your adventure so far.

ScriptAction.Script:
SaveData.ShowSaveDialog()

-- Welcome-back text when loading game
if SaveData.IsRestoringGame() then
    Log("TOWN_INN_SAVEPOINT_ENTER")
end

Children.Title: Sleep until Morning
Children.Tooltip: The bed does look rather inviting.

Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: You wake up feeling refreshed...

Children.Title: Sleep until Night
Children.Tooltip: The bed does look rather inviting.

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("INN_FOXTAUR_MOVE2")

if Storage.GetFlag("TOWN_INN_ROOM_VISITED") then
    Log("INN_FOXTAUR_MOVE3")
else
    Log("INN_FOXTAUR_MOVE3_NOROOM")
end

local foxbutt = Creature("CR_Town_Foxtaur")
local state = Combat2()
state:AddParticipant(Player)
state:AddParticipant(foxbutt)
state:SetGrappling(foxbutt, Player)
state:Begin()

-- TODO: assuming player can't actually eat the taur due to size.
-- so this doesn't handle vore scenarios at all.

Storage.SetFlag("town_inn_foxtaur_arrested", true)
Log("INN_FOXTAUR_ARREST1")

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Go back downstairs to the common room.

Children.Title: Truthful
Children.Tooltip: Try to relay the events as they happened.

Children.Title: Boast
Children.Tooltip: [Lie] Describe how you saved a lady's life.

Children.Title: Downplay
Children.Tooltip: Try to alleviate the charge of predation against the taur.
